data.name: DW8XLCE - BGM PACK
data.detailed_description:
Important Notice

This DLC is same as the one being sold for DYNASTY WARRIORS 8 Empires.
With DYNASTY WARRIORS 8 Xtreme Legends Complete Edition, you can play this DLC if you already purchase this DLC for DYNASTY WARRIORS 8 Empires.
Be careful not to purchase the same content twice.


About the Game

Eight new music tracks will be added that can be selected before battle or in the Sound Test.

The following are the new tracks specially composed for the game:
  • "THE EPIC (Breakthrough)"
  • "THE WORLD BORN AGAIN (Final Showdown)"
  • "LIKE A DANCER"(Charge)"
  • "SYNC CHORDS (Battlefield Bonds)"
  • "THE SWORD OF A FLOWER (Occupation)"
  • "COURAGEOUS ADVANCE (Advancing)"
  • "RUN WITH JAGUAR (Clash)"
  • "KEEPER OF THE WALLS (Defending)"

fullgame.name: DYNASTY WARRIORS 8: Xtreme Legends Complete Edition / 真・三國無双７ with 猛将伝

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 2.8 GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600 or better NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device
